Kumpleto at detalyado ang article ng Santa Maria, Bulacan sa Wikipedia. Proud na proud siguro ang gumawa nito.” :English: “''Wow! The article of Santa Maria, Bulacan in Wikipedia is very much detailed and complete. Maybe the one who made that article was so proud of it.''” From balay_1 of skyscrapercity.com http://www.skyscrapercity.com/showthread.php?t=461803 post #834 :“Actually napaka comprehensive ng information ng Sta. Maria sa Wikepedia. walang binatbat ang ibang bayan/syudad sa Bulacan.” From up_mc of skyscrapercity.com http://www.skyscrapercity.com/showthread.php?t=461803 post #816 == Content removal == The following contents have been removed: {{Notice|Please '''do not attempt''' to re-insert the following removed contents to the article. These fail Wikipedia guidelines by: '''Wikipedia is not a suppository lists of ''[[WP:DIRECTORY|directories]].'', excessive listing of ''[[WP:NOT#STATS|statistics]]'''''}} --''[[User:JL 09|JL 09]][[User talk:JL 09|Talk to me!]]'' 03:29, 23 August 2009 (UTC)

'''Santa Maria''': Nicolas Park, Poblacion |Muzon, CSJDM; - San Jose del Monte City Proper - San Vicente, Santa Maria - Santa Maria town proper and vice versa. |PHP 8.00 (first four kilometers) |- |'''[[Norzagaray, Bulacan]]'''

'''Santa Maria''': Nicolas Park, Poblacion |Norzagaray - Partida, Norzagaray - Pulong Yantok, [[Angat, Bulacan|Angat]], [[Pulong Buhangin,Santa Maria]] - Caypombo, Santa Maria - Guyong, Santa Maria - Dulong Bayan, Santa Maria - Santa Maria town proper and vice versa. |PHP 8.00 (first four kilometers) |- |} {{note|NLEX|1}}Jeepneys plying the [[North Luzon Expressway]] route are available until 12 midnight. {{note|MacArthur Highway|2}} available for 24 hours. ====Others==== Utility vans plying the [[San Fernando, Pampanga|San Fernando]], [[Pampanga]]- Santa Maria, Bulacan (via NLEX) route are also available. Tricycles are available for twenty-four hours. ===Road Networks=== The important road networks in Santa Maria are as follows: * Bocaue-San Jose Road - connecting Sta. Maria to the city of San Jose del Monte and Bocaue; * Sta. Maria By-Pass Road; * Norzagaray-Sta. Maria Road - connecting Sta. Maria to the towns of [[Angat]] and [[Norzagaray]]; * Santa Clara-Pandi Road - connecting [[Barangay Santa Clara, Santa Maria, Bulacan|Santa Maria]] to the towns of [[Pandi, Bulacan|Pandi]], [[Balagtas, Bulacan|Balagtas]], [[Bustos, Bulacan|Bustos]] and [[Baliuag]]; * The Manila North Road (Mac Arthur Highway); * Santa Maria{{spaced ndash}}Tungkong Mangga Road - a vital provincial road which links the [[San Jose del Monte City|City of San Jose del Monte]] to the town of Santa Maria. * the [[North Luzon Expressway]] (through [[Bocaue]] Exit). Based on the 2004 road inventory done by Municipal Engineer's Office, Santa Maria has a total road length of 218.38 km., 24.98 of which are national roads, 26.54 km are provincial roads, 19.07 km are municipal roads, and 147.79 km are barangay roads. Most of the roads are concrete and are in fair condition. ===Private Schools=== {{Notice|This contains list of contact numbers. This fails Wikipedia guidelines by [[WP:DIRECTORY]]}} High quality education is also made possible through the following private schools in Santa Maria, Bulacan. The list of private schools in Sta. {{Talk:Santa Maria, Bulacan/GA1}} ==Assessment comment== {{Substituted comment|length=651|lastedit=20090320015534|comment=The Honorable Mayor of Sta Maria Municipality of Sta Maria Sta Maria, Bulacan Sir: Greetings to you Sir and to the Honorable Vice Mayor and the Honorable Municipal councilors of the municipality. Please do something about the perenial heavy traffic congestion along the connecting road just after the north expresway going towards Bagbaguin. Perhaps we can appeal to the national government to put another exit right after the Bocaue exit towards north to connect Guyong to the North expresway in order to decongest the daily, heavy traffic in the area. Moreover, please extend the services of the water district to the Cityland Bulacan Heights.}} Substituted at 05:26, 30 April 2016 (UTC) ==POV and promotional statements== The 3rd paragraph stated that: {{quote|Santa Maria's total bank deposits reached PHP 17.3 billion as of June 2016, this accounts for almost 75% of eastern Bulacan's total bank deposits and ''dwarfing other cities and municipalities in the country''. ... It has a relatively high standard of living, with only 4% of the population living in poverty ''which is one of the lowest in the Philippines''.}} The statements in italics are ''not'' in the references but are improper editorial synthesis to imply a new (and [[WP:POV|POV]]) conclusion, see [[WP:SYNTHESIS]]. Furthermore, they are clearly promotional statements, against [[WP:PROMOTION]]. Therefore these statements are against WP policy and will be removed. If disagree, discuss here before reinstating it. -- '''[[User:P199|P 1 9 9]]'''  [[User talk:P199|✉]] 14:30, 21 November 2016 (UTC)
